system.requirements:
Tier 3; BS 45 or WS 45 or Willpower 45 
Aptitudes: Offence, Willpower
system.effect: When the character inflicts Righteous Fury with an Attack or Psychic Power that they achieved 3+ Degrees of Success on the Test for, they roll twice to etermine the amount of Critical damage inflicted with Righteous Fury, and take the higher result.
